title: Ghost Hunters
description: A unique puzzle game where you're trying to help a scared little ghost escape a mansion full of ghost hunters!
body1: Built using a modded version of PuzzleScript, Ghost Hunters is a puzzle game about escaping a spooky mansion. You control a scared little ghost as well as the direction of the light coming through the windows. The little ghost freezes in terror when caught in a beam of light, so use clever control over the light direction to create a path for the little ghost to safely leave the mansion and avoid the ghost hunters! Featured on CoolMathGames.com and Armorgames.com or try it yourself below!
